page.title: 04Survey Page 3
page.content: {7.}I asked "Do you think being a member of the E.E.C. is still good for yourself"? {Yes_42% No_19% Don't know_39%} {Jane {8.}There is low unemployment in the area so I asked "Should the unemployed try harder to find work"? {Yes_81% No_6% Don't know_13% Emma R {9.}I asked this question because I am concerned that the school might close down "Should the school close down because of the low number of pupils"? {Yes_2% No_92% Don't know_6% Sarah {10.}We live near to the Windscale Nuclear Reprocessing Plant so we asked "Are you worried about nuclear industry in this area"? {Yes_52% No_35% Don't know_13% Clare Mothers and fathers showed the {Colin most concern m2 & f2 said 62% {&Brian Yes.
